area.SimMacro:
[comment] ################ Paddock ################ [endcomment] <system name="[area.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\protocolmanager\lib\protocolmanager.dll"> [foreach area.outputfile][insert outputfile][endfor] [foreach area.micromet][insert micromet][endfor] [foreach area.logic][insert logic][endfor] [foreach area.manager][insert manager][endfor] [foreach area.irrigation][insert irrigation][endfor] [foreach area.fertiliser][insert fertiliser][endfor] [foreach area.surfaceom][insert surfaceom][endfor] [foreach area.soil][insert soil][endfor] [foreach area.phos][insert phos][endfor]
[foreach area.bambatsi as plant][insert bambatsi][endfor] [foreach area.broccoli as plant][insert broccoli][endfor] [foreach area.canola as plant][insert canola][endfor] [foreach area.chickpea as plant][insert chickpea][endfor] [foreach area.cowpea as plant][insert cowpea][endfor] [foreach area.egrandis as plant][insert egrandis][endfor] [foreach area.fababean as plant][insert fababean][endfor] [foreach area.fieldpea as plant][insert fieldpea][endfor] [foreach area.lablab as plant][insert lablab][endfor] [foreach area.lucerne as plant][insert lucerne][endfor] [foreach area.lupin as plant][insert lupin][endfor] [foreach area.maize as plant][insert maize][endfor] [foreach area.mucuna as plant][insert mucuna][endfor] [foreach area.mungbean as plant][insert mungbean][endfor] [foreach area.navybean as plant][insert navybean][endfor] [foreach area.ozcot as plant][insert ozcot][endfor] [foreach area.peanut as plant][insert peanut][endfor] [foreach area.pigeonpea as plant][insert pigeonpea][endfor] [foreach area.sorghum as plant][insert sorghum][endfor] [foreach area.soybean as plant][insert soybean][endfor] [foreach area.stylo as plant][insert stylo][endfor] [foreach area.sugar as plant][insert sugar][endfor] [foreach area.sunflower as plant][insert sunflower][endfor] [foreach area.weed as plant][insert weed][endfor] [foreach area.wheat as plant][insert wheat][endfor] [foreach area.root][insert root][endfor] [foreach area.slurp][insert slurp][endfor] [foreach area.stock][insert stock][endfor] [foreach area.stockScienceConverter as converter][insert stockScienceConverter][endfor] [foreach area.vinelogic as v1][insert vinelogic][endfor] [foreach area.stream][insert stream][endfor]
<component name="accum" executable="%apsuite\apsim\accum\lib\accum.dll"> <initdata> <parameters name="sample"> <property name="accum_variables">rain[15]</property> </parameters> </initdata> </component>
[foreach area.registrations][insert registrations][endfor] </system>

event.name: newmet
event.description: Event indicating change in meteorological data

registrations.SimMacro:
[comment] ################ Registrations ################ [endcomment] <registrations> <event name="summaryFileWrite" type="summaryFileWrite"/> <event name="error" type="string"/> <event name="NotifyTermination" type="string"/> <event name="gimme_water" type="string"/>
<respondToEvent name="tick" type="time"/> <respondToEvent name="newmet" type="newmet"/> <respondToEvent name="prepare" type="prepare"/> <respondToEvent name="process" type="process"/> <respondToEvent name="post" type="post"/> <respondToEvent name="end_week" type="null"/> <respondToEvent name="end_month" type="null"/> <respondToEvent name="end_year" type="null"/> <respondToEvent name="water_supplied" type="null"/> <respondToEvent name="irrigate" type="null"/> <respondToEvent name="sow" type="null"/>
<get name="today" type="integer4"/> <get name="day" type="integer4"/> <get name="year" type="integer4"/> <get name="dd/mm/yyyy" type="string"/> <get name="rain" type="single"/> <get name="radn" type="single"/> <get name="maxt" type="single"/> <get name="mint" type="single"/> <get name="latitude" type="single"/> <get name="tav" type="single"/> <get name="amp" type="single"/> <get name="co2" type="single"/> <get name="title" type="string"/>
<respondToGet name="streamflow" type="single"/> <respondToGet name="root_sw_uptake_vol" type="single"/> <respondToGet name="root_sw_supply_vol" type="single"/> <respondToGet name="sw_dep" array = "T" type="single"/> <respondToGet name="ll15_dep" array = "T" type="single"/> <respondToGet name="dul_dep" array = "T" type="single"/> <respondToGet name="sat_dep" array = "T" type="single"/> <respondToGet name="sw" array = "T" type="single"/> <respondToGet name="lai" array = "F" type="single"/> <respondToGet name="istage" array = "F" type="integer4"/>
<respondToSet name="root_sw_demand_vol" type="single"/> </registrations> <types> <type name="summaryFileWrite"> <field name="componentName" kind="string"/> <field name="lines" kind="string"/> </type> </types>

simulation.SimMacro:
[foreach simulations.simulation as sim] [file [sim.name].sim] <Simulation executable="%apsuite\apsim\protocolmanager\lib\protocolmanager.dll"> <title>[sim.name]</title> [comment] ################ screen ################ [endcomment] [foreach sim.summaryfile][insert summaryfile][endfor] <component name="Screen" executable="%apsuite\apsim\Screen\lib\Screen.dll"> <initdata> <parameters name="test"> <property name="screen_output">on</property> </parameters> </initdata> </component> [foreach sim.log][insert log][endfor] [foreach sim.clock][insert clock][endfor] [foreach sim.metfile][insert metfile][endfor] [foreach sim.micromet][insert micromet][endfor] [foreach sim.soi][insert soi][endfor] [foreach sim.outputfile][insert outputfile][endfor] [foreach sim.logic][insert logic][endfor] [foreach sim.spaceslurp][insert spaceslurp][endfor] [foreach sim.area][insert area][endfor] [foreach sim.stream][insert stream][endfor] [foreach sim.WaterSupply][insert WaterSupply][endfor]
[comment] ################ vinelogic specific files ################ [endcomment] [comment] Iterate through all vinelogics in the simulation, making an input file for each one [endcomment] [foreach sim.area as a] [foreach a.vinelogic as vl] [file [vl.name][vl.instance].inp] [vl.data] [endfile] [endfor] [endfor] </Simulation> [endfile] [endfor]

event.name: prepare
event.description: Start of daily simulation time step

event.name: post
event.description: End of daily simulation time step

outputfile.SimMacro: [comment] ################ outputfile ################ [endcomment] <component name="[outputfile.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\report\lib\report.dll"> <initdata> <parameters name="general"> <property name="outputfile">[outputfile.filename]</property> <property name="outputfrequency">[foreach outputfile.outputfiledescription as desc][foreach desc.events][foreach events.event as e][if "[e.eventname]" = "Daily"]post[elseif "[e.module]" = "global"][e.eventname][else][e.name][endif] [endfor][endfor][endfor]</property> </parameters> <variables> [foreach outputfile.outputfiledescription as desc] [foreach desc.variables as vars] [foreach vars.variable as var] [if "[var.module]" = "global"] <variable>[var.variablename][var.arrayspec] as [var.name]</variable> [elseif "[var.VariableType]" = "Water"] <variable>[var.module] Water.[var.variablename][var.arrayspec] as [var.name]</variable> [elseif "[var.VariableType]" = "Nitrogen"] <variable>[var.module] Nitrogen.[var.variablename][var.arrayspec] as [var.name]</variable> [else] <variable>[var.module].[var.variablename][var.arrayspec] as [var.name]</variable> [endif] [endfor] [endfor] [endfor] </variables> </initdata> </component>

metfile.SimMacro: [comment] ################ metfile ################ [endcomment] <component name="[metfile.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\input\lib\input.dll"> <initdata> <parameters name="file"> <property name="filename">[metfile.filename]</property> </parameters> </initdata> </component> [foreach metfile.climatechange as cc][insert climatechange][endfor]

logic.SimMacro: [comment] ################ logic ################ [endcomment] <component name="[logic.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\manager\lib\manager.dll"> <initdata> <rules> <rule name="sample.init" condition="init">[logic.init]</rule> <rule name="sample.end_of_day" condition="end_of_day">[logic.endofday]</rule> <rule name="sample.start_of_day" condition="start_of_day">[logic.startofday]</rule> </rules> </initdata> </component>

variable.name: irr_fasw
variable.description: Irrigation fraction of available soil water (0-1)

variable.name: irr_deficit
variable.description: Water deficit within the critical irrigation soil depth (mm)

fertiliser.Description: The fertiliser module doesn't have any properties. It is required though if you wish to apply fertiliser."

variable.name: flow_water
variable.description: Water flow from each layer - layered(mm)

variable.name: flow_no3
variable.description: N flow out of each layer - layered (kg/ha)

soil.SimMacro:
[comment] ################ Soil ################ [endcomment] [foreach soil.Water as w] <component name="[soil.name] Water" executable="%apsuite\apsim\soilwat2\lib\soilwat2.dll"> <initdata> <include>%apsuite\apsim\soilwat2\soilwat2.ini</include> <parameters name="black_earth"> [foreach soil.InitWater as initwater]
[if [initwater.1.sw] > 0] <property name="sw">[foreach initwater.layer][layer.sw.innerxml] [endfor]</property> [endif] [foreach initwater.percentmethod as p] [if ([p.distributed] = "filled from top")] <property name="profile_fesw">[p.percent]</property> [else] <property name="insoil">[p.percent]</property> [endif] [endfor] [foreach initwater.depthwetsoilmethod as depthwetsoil] <property name="wet_soil_depth">[depthwetsoil.depth]</property> [endfor]
[endfor] <property name="diffus_const">[w.DiffusConst]</property> <property name="diffus_slope">[w.DiffusSlope]</property> <property name="cn2_bare">[w.Cn2Bare]</property> <property name="cn_red">[w.CnRed]</property> <property name="cn_cov">[w.CnCov]</property> <property name="salb">[w.Salb]</property> <property name="cona">[w.Cona]</property> <property name="u">[w.U]</property> <property name="dlayer"> [foreach w.layer as l][l.thickness] [endfor] </property> <property name="sat">[foreach w.layer as l][l.sat] [endfor]</property> <property name="dul">[foreach w.layer as l][l.dul] [endfor]</property> <property name="ll15">[foreach w.layer as l][l.ll15] [endfor]</property> <property name="air_dry">[foreach w.layer as l][l.airdry] [endfor]</property> <property name="swcon">[foreach w.layer as l][l.swcon] [endfor]</property> <property name="bd">[foreach w.layer as l][l.bd] [endfor]</property> [if [w.1.mwcon] > 0] <property name="mwcon">[foreach w.layer as l][l.mwcon] [endfor]</property> [endif] </parameters> </initdata> </component> [endfor] [foreach soil.Nitrogen as n] <component name="[soil.name] Nitrogen" executable="%apsuite\apsim\soiln2\lib\soiln2.dll"> <initdata> <include>%apsuite\apsim\soiln2\soiln2.ini</include> <parameters name="black_earth"> <property name="root_cn">20.</property> <property name="root_wt">1000.</property> <property name="soil_cn">14.5</property> <property name="enr_a_coeff">7.4</property> <property name="enr_b_coeff">0.2</property> <property name="profile_reduction">off</property> <property name="oc">[foreach n.layer as l] [l.oc][endfor]</property> <property name="ph">[foreach n.layer as l] [l.ph][endfor]</property> <property name="fbiom">[foreach n.layer as l] [l.fbiom][endfor]</property> <property name="finert">[foreach n.layer as l] [l.finert][endfor]</property> <property name="ureappm">0 0 0 0 0 0 0</property> [foreach soil.InitNitrogen as i] <property name="no3ppm">[foreach i.layer][layer.no3] [endfor]</property> <property name="nh4ppm">[foreach i.layer][layer.nh4] [endfor]</property> [endfor]
</parameters> </initdata> </component> [endfor]

phos.SimMacro: [comment] ################ SoilP ################ [endcomment] <component name="[Phos.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\soilp\lib\soilp.dll"> <initdata> <include>%apsuite\apsim\soilp\soilp.ini</include> [foreach area.soil] [foreach soil.Phosphorus as p] <parameters name="sample"> <property name="Labile_P">[foreach p.layer as l] [l.LabileP][endfor]</property> <property name="banded_P">[foreach p.layer as l] [l.bandedP][endfor]</property> <property name="rock_P">[foreach p.layer as l] [l.rockP][endfor]</property> <property name="sorption">[foreach p.layer as l] [l.sorption][endfor]</property> <property name="Residue_CP">[p.ResidueCP]</property> <property name="Root_CP">[p.RootCP]</property> <property name="rate_dissol_rock_P">[p.RateDissolRock]</property> </parameters> [endfor] [endfor] </initdata> </component>

stock.SimMacro: [comment] ################ Stock ################ [endcomment] <component name="[stock.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\stock\lib\stock.dll"> <executable>"%apsuite\apsim\stock\lib\stock.dll"</executable> <initdata> <![CDATA[ <initsection> <init name="published_events" array="T"></init> <init name="driver_connections" array="T"></init> <init name="breed" kind="string"><val>[stock.breed]</val></init> <init name="death_rate" kind="double" unit="/y"><val>[stock.death_rate]</val></init> <init name="[stock.type]" array="T"> <element> <field name="number" kind="integer4"> <val>0</val> </field> </element> </init> </initsection> ]]> </initdata> </component>

variable.name: dm_feed_on_offer
variable.description: Dry matter of feed on offer (kg/ha)

StockScienceConverter.SimMacro:
[comment] ################ StockScienceConverter ################ [endcomment] <component name="[converter.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\stock\lib\stockscienceconverter.dll"> <initdata> <parameters name="standard"> <property name="herbage_module_name">[converter.herbage_module_name]</property> <property name="debug">[converter.debug]</property>
</parameters> <[converter.herbage_module_name] name="standard"> <property name="dmdValue">[converter.dmdValue]</property>
<property name="p_conc_green_leaf_default">[converter.p_conc_green_leaf_default]</property> <property name="p_conc_green_stem_default">[converter.p_conc_green_stem_default]</property> <property name="p_conc_senesced_leaf_default">[converter.p_conc_senesced_leaf_default]</property> <property name="p_conc_senesced_stem_default">[converter.p_conc_senesced_stem_default]</property> <property name="p_conc_dead_leaf_default">[converter.p_conc_dead_leaf_default]</property> <property name="p_conc_dead_stem_default">[converter.p_conc_dead_stem_default]</property>
<property name="ash_alk_green_leaf_default">[converter.ash_alk_green_leaf_default]</property> <property name="ash_alk_green_stem_default">[converter.ash_alk_green_stem_default]</property> <property name="ash_alk_senesced_leaf_default">[converter.ash_alk_senesced_leaf_default]</property> <property name="ash_alk_senesced_stem_default">[converter.ash_alk_senesced_stem_default]</property> <property name="ash_alk_dead_leaf_default">[converter.ash_alk_dead_leaf_default]</property> <property name="ash_alk_dead_stem_default">[converter.ash_alk_dead_stem_default]</property>
<property name="ns_ratio_green_leaf_default">[converter.ns_ratio_green_leaf_default]</property> <property name="ns_ratio_green_stem_default">[converter.ns_ratio_green_stem_default]</property> <property name="ns_ratio_senesced_leaf_default">[converter.ns_ratio_senesced_leaf_default]</property> <property name="ns_ratio_senesced_stem_default">[converter.ns_ratio_senesced_stem_default]</property> <property name="ns_ratio_dead_leaf_default">[converter.ns_ratio_dead_leaf_default]</property> <property name="ns_ratio_dead_stem_default">[converter.ns_ratio_dead_stem_default]</property>
<property name="np_ratio_green_leaf_default">[converter.np_ratio_green_leaf_default]</property> <property name="np_ratio_green_stem_default">[converter.np_ratio_green_stem_default]</property> <property name="np_ratio_senesced_leaf_default">[converter.np_ratio_senesced_leaf_default]</property> <property name="np_ratio_senesced_stem_default">[converter.np_ratio_senesced_stem_default]</property> <property name="np_ratio_dead_leaf_default">[converter.np_ratio_dead_leaf_default]</property> <property name="np_ratio_dead_stem_default">[converter.np_ratio_dead_stem_default]</property>
<property name="dmd_green_leaf">[converter.dmd_green_leaf]</property> <property name="dmd_green_stem">[converter.dmd_green_stem]</property> <property name="dmd_senesced_leaf">[converter.dmd_senesced_leaf]</property> <property name="dmd_senesced_stem">[converter.dmd_senesced_stem]</property> <property name="dmd_dead_leaf">[converter.dmd_dead_leaf]</property> <property name="dmd_dead_stem">[converter.dmd_dead_stem]</property>
<property name="KQ5Leaf">[converter.KQ5Leaf]</property> <property name="KQ5Stem">[converter.KQ5Stem]</property> <property name="KQ4">[converter.KQ4]</property>
<property name="cp_n_ratio">[converter.cp_n_ratio]</property>
</[converter.herbage_module_name]> </initdata> </component> <component name="[converter.name]manager" executable="%apsuite\apsim\manager\lib\manager.dll"> <initdata> <rules> [foreach converter.rule as rule] [foreach rule.condition as condition] <rule name="[rule.name] - [condition.name]" condition="[condition.name]"> [condition.innerxml] [endfor] [foreach rule.category as category] [category.xml] [endfor] </rule>
[endfor] </rules> </initdata> </component>

manager.SimMacro: [comment] ################ manager ################ [endcomment] <component name="manager" executable="%apsuite\apsim\manager\lib\manager.dll"> <initdata> <rules> [foreach manager.rule as rule] [foreach rule.condition as condition] <rule name="[rule.name] - [condition.name]" condition="[condition.name]"> [condition.innerxml] [foreach rule.category as category] [category.xml] [endfor] </rule> [endfor] [endfor] </rules> </initdata> </component>

variable.name: surfaceom_wt
variable.description: Total mass of all surface organic materials

variable.name: surfaceom_c
variable.description: Total mass of all surface organic carbon

variable.name: surfaceom_n
variable.description: Total mass of all surface organic nitrogen

variable.name: surfaceom_p
variable.description: Total mass of all surface organic phosphor

variable.name: surfaceom_cover
variable.description: Fraction of ground covered by all surface OM"s

variable.name: surfaceom_c1_xxxx
variable.description: Mass of organic carbon in "xxxx" in fpool1

variable.name: surfaceom_c2_xxxx
variable.description: Mass of organic carbon in "xxxx" in fpool2

variable.name: surfaceom_c3_xxxx
variable.description: Mass of organic carbon in "xxxx" in fpool3

variable.name: surfaceom_n1_xxxx
variable.description: Mass of organic nitrogen in "xxxx" in fpool1

variable.name: surfaceom_n2_xxxx
variable.description: Mass of organic nitrogen in "xxxx" in fpool2

variable.name: surfaceom_n3_xxxx
variable.description: Mass of organic nitrogen in "xxxx" in fpool3

variable.name: surfaceom_p1_xxxx
variable.description: Mass of organic phosphorous in "xxxx" in fpool1

variable.name: surfaceom_p2_xxxx
variable.description: Mass of organic phosphorous in "xxxx" in fpool2

variable.name: surfaceom_p3_xxxx
variable.description: Mass of organic phosphorous in "xxxx" in fpool3

variable.name: standing_fr_xxxx
variable.description: Fraction of "xxxx" which is inert, ie not in contact with the ground

variable.name: cnrf_xxxx
variable.description: C:N ratio factor for decomposition for "xxxx"

surfaceom.SimMacro: [comment] ################ surfaceom ################ [endcomment] <component name="[surfaceom.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\surfaceom\lib\surfaceom.dll"> <initdata> <include>%apsuite\apsim\surfaceom\surfaceom.ini</include> <parameters name="sample"> <property name="name">[surfaceom.PoolName]</property> <property name="type">[surfaceom.type]</property> <property name="mass">[surfaceom.mass]</property> <property name="cnr">[surfaceom.cnr]</property> <property name="standing_fraction">[surfaceom.standing_fraction]</property> </parameters> </initdata> </component>

variable.name: vpd_estimation
variable.description: vpd_estimation: What Grasp used for daily VPD

variable.name: growth_transp
variable.description: growth_transp: Potential growth by mass flow

variable.name: death_water
variable.description: death_water; Leaf death by water stress

variable.name: death_water_stem
variable.description: death_w_stem: Stem death by water stress

broccoli.Description: Most APSIM crop or plant modules do not require extra user input. Crop specific parameters are either provided for your chosen soil, or are captured as part of the standard model validation process.
broccoli.SimMacro: [comment] ################ broccoli ################ [endcomment] <component name="[plant.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\plant\lib\plant.dll"> <initdata> <include>%apsuite\apsim\[plant.xmltype]\[plant.xmltype].ini</include> [foreach area.soil as s] [foreach s.SoilCrop as sc] [if [plant.xmltype] = [sc.name]] <parameters name="sample"> <property name="ll">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.ll][endfor]</property> <property name="kl">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.kl][endfor]</property> <property name="XF">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.xf][endfor]</property> </parameters> [endif] [endfor] [endfor] </initdata> </component>

canola.Description: Most APSIM crop or plant modules do not require extra user input. Crop specific parameters are either provided for your chosen soil, or are captured as part of the standard model validation process.
canola.SimMacro: [comment] ################ canola ################ [endcomment] <component name="[plant.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\plant\lib\plant.dll"> <initdata> <include>%apsuite\apsim\[plant.xmltype]\[plant.xmltype].ini</include> [foreach area.soil as s] [foreach s.SoilCrop as sc] [if [plant.xmltype] = [sc.name]] <parameters name="sample"> <property name="ll">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.ll][endfor]</property> <property name="kl">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.kl][endfor]</property> <property name="XF">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.xf][endfor]</property> </parameters> [endif] [endfor] [endfor] </initdata> </component>

chickpea.SimMacro: [comment] ################ chickpea ################ [endcomment] <component name="[plant.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\plant\lib\plant.dll"> <initdata> <include>%apsuite\apsim\[plant.xmltype]\[plant.xmltype].ini</include> [foreach area.soil as s] [foreach s.SoilCrop as sc] [if [plant.xmltype] = [sc.name]] <parameters name="sample"> <property name="ll">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.ll][endfor]</property> <property name="kl">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.kl][endfor]</property> <property name="XF">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.xf][endfor]</property> </parameters> [endif] [endfor] [endfor] </initdata> </component>

cowpea.SimMacro: [comment] ################ cowpea ################ [endcomment] <component name="[plant.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\plant\lib\plant.dll"> <initdata> <include>%apsuite\apsim\[plant.xmltype]\[plant.xmltype].ini</include> [foreach area.soil as s] [foreach s.SoilCrop as sc] [if [plant.xmltype] = [sc.name]] <parameters name="sample"> <property name="ll">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.ll][endfor]</property> <property name="kl">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.kl][endfor]</property> <property name="XF">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.xf][endfor]</property> </parameters> [endif] [endfor] [endfor] </initdata> </component>

fababean.SimMacro: [comment] ################ fababean ################ [endcomment] <component name="[plant.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\plant\lib\plant.dll"> <initdata> <include>%apsuite\apsim\[plant.xmltype]\[plant.xmltype].ini</include> [foreach area.soil as s] [foreach s.SoilCrop as sc] [if [plant.xmltype] = [sc.name]] <parameters name="sample"> <property name="ll">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.ll][endfor]</property> <property name="kl">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.kl][endfor]</property> <property name="XF">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.xf][endfor]</property> </parameters> [endif] [endfor] [endfor] </initdata> </component>

fieldpea.Description: Most APSIM crop or plant modules do not require extra user input. Crop specific parameters are either provided for your chosen soil, or are captured as part of the standard model validation process.
fieldpea.SimMacro: [comment] ################ fieldpea ################ [endcomment] <component name="[plant.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\plant\lib\plant.dll"> <initdata> <include>%apsuite\apsim\[plant.xmltype]\[plant.xmltype].ini</include> [foreach area.soil as s] [foreach s.SoilCrop as sc] [if [plant.xmltype] = [sc.name]] <parameters name="sample"> <property name="ll">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.ll][endfor]</property> <property name="kl">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.kl][endfor]</property> <property name="XF">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.xf][endfor]</property> </parameters> [endif] [endfor] [endfor] </initdata> </component>

lablab.Description: Most APSIM crop or plant modules do not require extra user input. Crop specific parameters are either provided for your chosen soil, or are captured as part of the standard model validation process.
lablab.SimMacro: [comment] ################ lablab ################ [endcomment] <component name="[plant.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\plant\lib\plant.dll"> <initdata> <include>%apsuite\apsim\[plant.xmltype]\[plant.xmltype].ini</include> [foreach area.soil as s] [foreach s.SoilCrop as sc] [if [plant.xmltype] = [sc.name]] <parameters name="sample"> <property name="ll">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.ll][endfor]</property> <property name="kl">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.kl][endfor]</property> <property name="XF">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.xf][endfor]</property> </parameters> [endif] [endfor] [endfor] </initdata> </component>

maize.Description: Most APSIM crop or plant modules do not require extra user input. Crop specific parameters are either provided for your chosen soil, or are captured as part of the standard model validation process.

variable.name: tt_tot
variable.description: Maize Cum. growing degree days since sowing

variable.name: swdef_photo
variable.description: Maize soil water factor for photosynthesis

variable.name: swdef_expan
variable.description: Maize soil water factor for expansion

maize.SimMacro: [comment] ################ maize ################ [endcomment] <component name="[plant.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\maize\lib\maize.dll"> <initdata> <include>%apsuite\apsim\[plant.xmltype]\[plant.xmltype].ini</include> [foreach area.soil as s] [foreach s.SoilCrop as sc] [if [plant.xmltype] = [sc.name]] <parameters name="sample"> <property name="ll">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.ll][endfor]</property> <property name="kl">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.kl][endfor]</property> <property name="XF">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.xf][endfor]</property> </parameters> [endif] [endfor] [endfor] </initdata> </component>

ozcot.SimMacro: [comment] ################ ozcot ################ [endcomment] <component name="[plant.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\ozcot\lib\ozcot.dll"> <initdata> <include>%apsuite\apsim\[plant.xmltype]\[plant.xmltype].ini</include> [foreach area.soil as s] [foreach s.SoilCrop as sc] [if [plant.xmltype] = [sc.name]] <parameters name="sample"> <property name="ll">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.ll][endfor]</property> <property name="kl">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.kl][endfor]</property> <property name="XF">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.xf][endfor]</property> </parameters> [endif] [endfor] [endfor] </initdata> </component>

pigeonp.Description: Most APSIM crop or plant modules do not require extra user input. Crop specific parameters are either provided for your chosen soil, or are captured as part of the standard model validation process.
pigeonp.SimMacro: [comment] ################ pigeonpea ################ [endcomment] <component name="[plant.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\plant\lib\plant.dll"> <initdata> <include>%apsuite\apsim\[plant.xmltype]\[plant.xmltype].ini</include> [foreach area.soil as s] [foreach s.SoilCrop as sc] [if [plant.xmltype] = [sc.name]] <parameters name="sample"> <property name="ll">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.ll][endfor]</property> <property name="kl">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.kl][endfor]</property> <property name="XF">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.xf][endfor]</property> </parameters> [endif] [endfor] [endfor] </initdata> </component>

slurp.SimMacro: [comment] ################ slurp ################ [endcomment] <component name="[slurp.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\slurp\lib\slurp.dll"> <initdata> <parameters name="sample"> <property name="crop_type">[slurp.type]</property> <property name="lai">[slurp.LAI]</property> <property name="laid">[slurp.LAId]</property> <property name="kg">[slurp.Kg]</property> <property name="kd">[slurp.Kd]</property> <property name="vpd">0 10 50</property> <property name="fvpd">1 1 1</property> <property name="height">[slurp.height]</property> <property name="frgr">[slurp.Frgr]</property> <property name="tav">5 20 25 40</property> <property name="ft">1 1 1 1</property> [foreach area.soil as s] [foreach s.SoilCrop as sc] [if [sc.name] = [slurp.type]] <property name="ll">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.ll][endfor]</property> <property name="kl">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.kl][endfor]</property> <property name="XF">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.xf][endfor]</property> <property name="RLV">0.05 0.03 0.02 0.01 0.01 0.005 0.001</property> [endif] [endfor] [endfor] </parameters> </initdata> </component>

sorghum.SimMacro: [comment] ################ sorghum ################ [endcomment] <component name="[plant.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\sorghum\lib\sorghum.dll"> <initdata> <include>%apsuite\apsim\sorghum\sorghum.ini</include> [foreach area.soil as s] [foreach s.SoilCrop as sc] [if [plant.xmltype] = [sc.name]] <parameters name="sample"> <property name="ll">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.ll][endfor]</property> <property name="kl">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.kl][endfor]</property> <property name="XF">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.xf][endfor]</property> </parameters> [endif] [endfor] [endfor] </initdata> </component>

stylo.SimMacro: [comment] ################ stylo ################ [endcomment] <component name="[plant.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\plant\lib\plant.dll"> <initdata> <include>%apsuite\apsim\[plant.xmltype]\[plant.xmltype].ini</include> [foreach area.soil as s] [foreach s.SoilCrop as sc] [if [plant.xmltype] = [sc.name]] <parameters name="sample"> <property name="ll">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.ll][endfor]</property> <property name="kl">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.kl][endfor]</property> <property name="XF">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.xf][endfor]</property> </parameters> [endif] [endfor] [endfor] </initdata> </component>

variable.name: rlv
variable.description: Sugar root length density for each layer (mm/mm3)

variable.name: biomass_n
variable.description: Sugar total N in biomass (green + trash) (g/m2)

variable.name: n_conc_leaf
variable.description: Sugar N concentration in green leaf (g/g)

variable.name: tlai
variable.description: Sugar total leaf area index (green and senesced)

variable.name: sw_demand
variable.description: Sugar crop demand for water (potential uptake) (mm)

variable.name: nfact_photo
variable.description: Sugar Nitrogen stress factor on photosynthesis (0-1)

variable.name: nfact_expan
variable.description: Sugar Nitrogen stress factor on cell expansion (0-1)

variable.name: swdef_pheno
variable.description: Sugar water stress factor on phenology (0-1)

variable.name: swdef_photo
variable.description: Sugar water stress factor on photosynthesis (0-1)

variable.name: swdef_expan
variable.description: Sugar water stress factor on cell expansion (0-1)

variable.name: ep
variable.description: Sugar daily crop water uptake, Ep (mm)

sugar.SimMacro: [comment] ################ sugar ################ [endcomment] <component name="[plant.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\sugar\lib\sugar.dll"> <initdata> <include>%apsuite\apsim\sugar\sugar.ini</include> [foreach area.soil as s] [foreach s.SoilCrop as sc] [if [plant.xmltype] = [sc.name]] <parameters name="sample"> <property name="uptake_source">calc</property> <property name="ll">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.ll][endfor]</property> <property name="kl">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.kl][endfor]</property> <property name="XF">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.xf][endfor]</property> <property name="rlv">0.04 0.02 0.01 .005 0.00 0.00 0.00</property> </parameters> [endif] [endfor] [endfor] </initdata> </component>

sunflower.Description: Most APSIM crop or plant modules do not require extra user input. Crop specific parameters are either provided for your chosen soil, or are captured as part of the standard model validation process.

variable.name: swdef_photo
variable.description: Sunflower water stress factor for photosynthesis

variable.name: swdef_pheno
variable.description: Sunflower water stress factor for phenology

variable.name: swdef_expan
variable.description: Sunflower water stress factor for expansion

variable.name: sw_supply
variable.description: Sunflower water supply over all layers

variable.name: sw_demand
variable.description: Sunflower total crop demand for water

variable.name: green_biomass_n
variable.description: Sunflower total above ground biomass N (kg/ha)

variable.name: nfact_photo
variable.description: Sunflower nitrogen stress factor for photosynthesis

variable.name: nfact_pheno
variable.description: Sunflower nitrogen stress factor for phenology

variable.name: nfact_expan
variable.description: Sunflower nitrogen stress factor for expansion

variable.name: pfact_photo
variable.description: Sunflower phosphorus stress factor for photosynthesis

variable.name: pfact_pheno
variable.description: Sunflower phosphorus stress factor for phenology

variable.name: pfact_expan
variable.description: Sunflower phosphorus stress factor for expansion

sunflower.SimMacro: [comment] ################ sunflower ################ [endcomment] <component name="[plant.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\cropmod\lib\cropmod.dll"> <initdata> <include>%apsuite\apsim\[plant.xmltype]\[plant.xmltype].ini</include> [foreach area.soil as s] [foreach s.SoilCrop as sc] [if [plant.xmltype] = [sc.name]] <parameters name="sample"> <property name="ll">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.ll][endfor]</property> <property name="kl">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.kl][endfor]</property> <property name="XF">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.xf][endfor]</property> </parameters> [endif] [endfor] [endfor] </initdata> </component>

wheat.SimMacro: [comment] ################ wheat ################ [endcomment] <component name="[plant.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\plant\lib\plant.dll"> <initdata> <include>%apsuite\apsim\[plant.xmltype]\[plant.xmltype].ini</include> [foreach area.soil as s] [foreach s.SoilCrop as sc] [if [plant.xmltype] = [sc.name]] <parameters name="sample"> <property name="ll">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.ll][endfor]</property> <property name="kl">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.kl][endfor]</property> <property name="XF">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.xf][endfor]</property> </parameters> [endif] [endfor] [endfor] </initdata> </component>

venlink.Documentation: ../apsim/venlink/docs/Guide to linking APSIM with the VENSIM.htm

egrandis.Description: Most APSIM crop or plant modules do not require extra user input. Crop specific parameters are either provided for your chosen soil, or are captured as part of the standard model validation process.

variable.name: adm_green
variable.description: E. grandis Live Above-ground Biomass Pools

variable.name: adm_dead
variable.description: E. grandis Dead Above-ground Biomass Pools

variable.name: adm_sen
variable.description: E. grandis Senesced Above-ground Biomass Pools

egrandis.SimMacro: [comment] ################ egrandis ################ [endcomment] <component name="[plant.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\growth\lib\growth.dll"> <initdata> <include>%apsuite\apsim\egrandis\egrandis.ini</include> [foreach area.soil as s] [foreach s.SoilCrop as sc] [if [plant.xmltype] = [sc.name]] <parameters name="sample"> <property name="crop_type">grandis</property> <property name="uptake_source">calc</property> <property name="n_uptake_source">calc</property> <property name="rlv"> 0.01 [foreach sc.layer as l] 0.0[endfor]</property> <property name="ll">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.ll][endfor]</property> <property name="kl">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.kl][endfor]</property> <property name="XF">[foreach sc.layer as l] [l.xf][endfor]</property> </parameters> [endif] [endfor] [endfor] </initdata> </component>

stream.Description: The stream module doesn't have any properties. It is required though if you wish to track stream flow in a spatial simulation."

root.Description: The Root module doesn't have any properties. It is required though if you wish to use the spatial root system capability in APSIM."

spaceslurp.Description: The Spatial slurp module doesn't have any properties. It is required though if you wish to use the spatial root system capability in APSIM."

climatechange.Description: This component allows the user to apply modifiers to daily climate variables in order to investigate the effects of climate change.
climatechange.SimMacro: [comment] ################ climatechange ################ [endcomment] <component name="[cc.name]" executable="%apsuite\apsim\manager\lib\manager.dll"> <initdata> <rules> <rule name="climatechange" condition="init"> co2 = [cc.co2] </rule> <rule name="climatechange" condition="prenewmet"> !change met data to reflect climate change met.maxt = met.maxt + [cc.maxtmodifier] met.mint = met.mint + [cc.mintmodifier] met.rain = met.rain * [cc.rainmodifier] met.radn = met.radn * [cc.radiationmodifier] </rule> </rules> </initdata> </component>

soi.Description: This component allows the user to add SOI phases to a simulation. These phases can then be used in manager logic.
